name: Steven GADBOIS and Judith A. Gadbois and Larry P. Fox and Glenda M. Kreiser v. LEB-CO BUILDERS, INC., Appellant v. BETHEL TOWNSHIP, Appellant

parties: Steven GADBOIS and Judith A. Gadbois and Larry P. Fox and Glenda M. Kreiser v. LEB-CO BUILDERS, INC., Appellant v. BETHEL TOWNSHIP, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeals dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Frederick S. Wolf, Lebanon, for Leb-Co Builders, Inc.
Thomas S. Long, Lebanon, for Bethel.
George E. Christianson, Lebanon, for Gadbois, et ux. and Fox, et al.
casebody.head_matter:
475 A.2d 742
Steven GADBOIS and Judith A. Gadbois and Larry P. Fox and Glenda M. Kreiser v. LEB-CO BUILDERS, INC., Appellant v. BETHEL TOWNSHIP, Appellant
at No. 45,
at No. 44.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 16, 1984.
Decided May 25, 1984.
Frederick S. Wolf, Lebanon, for Leb-Co Builders, Inc.
Thomas S. Long, Lebanon, for Bethel.
George E. Christianson, Lebanon, for Gadbois, et ux. and Fox, et al.
